channel.title: Workshop on DSG | IIT Roorkee
channel.description: Recent content in Workshop on DSG | IIT Roorkee

item.title: Kaggle Meetup: E-Summit 20
item.description: Data Science Group in collaboration with E-Summit IIT R, and Kaggle is organising the very first Data Enthusiasts Meetup in Roorkee.

item.title: Workshop: Machine Learning 2019
item.description: Greetings IIT R! We are back with our workshop on Machine Learning. The workshop is specifically designed for 1st-year students and it would help you get comfortable with basic ML algorithms, their explanation and implementation.

item.title: Intro To Data Science Libraries
item.description: Greetings IIT R! We are back with the first workshop of the semester. We would be introducing the basics of python and data science libraries such as numpy, pandas, matplotlib, scikit-learn and PyTorch.

item.title: Workshop: Deep Learning 2018
item.description: Meet us at our Deep Learning Workshop and learn from scratch implementation of how to teach machines to see, In order to understand things a little better, you may like to go through the study material shared here.
